LanguageData.FT_BallisticShield.label: ballistic shield
LanguageData.FT_BallisticShield.description: A mobile ballistic shield for special task, quite light-weighted so it can be easily carry and deploy. useful in close quarter defense and base assault.
LanguageData.FT_BarbedWire.label: barbed wire
LanguageData.FT_BarbedWire.description: A type of steel fencing wire constructed with sharp edges or points arranged at intervals along the strands,quite light-weighted so it can be easily carry and deploy. useful in close quarter defense and base assault.
LanguageData.FT_MedicBed.label: field medic stretcher
LanguageData.FT_MedicBed.description: A stretcher specially designed for use in battlefield first-aid. it's foldable which makes it easy to carry and depoly, it improves medical outcomes over normal beds, but not a good place to rest.
